instructions: In your iPhone's web browser, like Chrome or Safari, go to Google Voice . At the top right, tap Settings . Scroll down to Payments . Next to Current balance , tap Add credit . Select an amount to add, then tap Add credit . Select your payment method, then tap Buy . You get an email to confirm your purchase. (Optional) Next to Auto-recharge , select what to do when your balance falls below $2.00: $10, $25, $50 Automatically add this amount of credit. After you select your payment method, tap Save . Notify me via email Get an email reminder when your balance is low. Off Don't automatically add more credit to your account.
